text: Otto Georg Schily (born 20 July 1932) is a German politician. He was the Federal Minister of the Interior of Germany from 1998 to 2005 in the cabinet of Chancellor Gerhard Schr√∂der. He is a member of the Social Democratic Party of Germany (SPD).Roger Cohen (December 29, 1998), Schroder Aide Typifies New German Subtlety New York Times. ==References== Category:1932 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Bavaria Category:Politicians of the Social Democratic Party of Germany Category:Politicians from North Rhine-Westphalia Category:Interior ministers of Germany
title: Otto Schily
